Hmm hmm hmm."},{"lineNumber":110398,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺も乗せろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let me ride too."},{"lineNumber":110399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":110400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ、腰が突然……あたたっ……ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, my back suddenly... ouch... hmm hmm hmm."},{"lineNumber":110401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、逃げるなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, don't run away!"},{"lineNumber":110402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm?"},{"lineNumber":110403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おお、これはランス殿、シィル殿。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"O-oh, Lord Rance, Lady Siil. Hmm hmm hmm."},{"lineNumber":110404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　どうかしましたか？","translatedEnglishLine":"? Is something wrong?"},{"lineNumber":110405,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだか慌てているようですが」","translatedEnglishLine":"You seem to be in a hurry."},{"lineNumber":110406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「テラ様を捜しておりましてな……","translatedEnglishLine":"We are searching for Lady Tera..."},{"lineNumber":110407,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこかで見かけませんでしたかな？　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Have you seen her anywhere? Hmm hmm hmm."},{"lineNumber":110408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、テラ様なら先ほど屋上へ向かっていましたよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, Lady Tera headed for the rooftop a little while ago."},{"lineNumber":110409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお……ありがとうございます……ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh... thank you very much... hmm hmm hmm."},{"lineNumber":110410,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、テラ様……お付きもつけず……ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But Lady Tera... without any attendants... hmm hmm hmm."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿な俺にも、守るべきものが何か、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even a fool like me knows what I must protect,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それくらいは分かってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I at least understand that much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この先に行こうってんなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you intend to go any further...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はあんたの前に立ちはだかるぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll stand in your way!
...Hmph, interesting.
I'll beat you down!
Wait a minuteーーー!
W-what is it?
...I have a bad feeling about this.
Hmm?
Ubbabaaーーー!?!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとパットンにぴしゃーんと雷撃が落ちた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A bolt of lightning struck Rance and Patton with a sharp crack.
Gah...!
Th-that was Hanti's magic...
You...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか守ろうとしてたのは俺の方？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that you were actually trying to protect me?
Ye...
That's how it was...
Gah...!
The two fell down at the same time.
Hah...
So stupid...
Well then, us aliens...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこまで役に立てるか……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...how much help can we be... hmm hmm hmm.
Thanks, Grandpa!
See you later!
Hohoho. Hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　なんだいつの間に仲良くなった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hm? When did you two become friends?
This is for Lord Rance. Hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、あの子達に背に乗せて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, those kids begged me to let them ride on my back

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空を飛んで欲しいとせがまれましてな。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fly through the sky. Hmm hmm hmm.
Oh, so you let them ride?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「少しこの周りをぐるーりと。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We flew around here for a little while. Hmm hmm hmm.
Hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「異星人のくせに面倒見がいいではないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For an alien, you're surprisingly caring.
Hohoho.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正直、見た目の違いもあり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To be honest, given how different we look,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂らはこの城内で浮いておりますが……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we stand out inside this castle... hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「子供はそういうのを無視してくれますからの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But children ignore such things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 年甲斐もなくはしゃいでしまいましたの。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though it's unbecoming at my age, I got all excited. Hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「異星の者でも子供は可愛いものです。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even to us aliens, children are adorable. Hmm hmm hmm.
Is that so.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、二人も乗せて飛べるんだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But you can fly carrying two of them, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「小さい子二人くらいなら、まあ……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's about two small kids, well... hmm hmm hmm.
That said, if they’re too heavy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辛いものがありますがの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it can be pretty tough.
Hohoho. Hmm hmm hmm.
Let me ride too.
Ugh, my back suddenly... ouch... hmm hmm hmm.
Ah, don't run away!
Hmm?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おお、これはランス殿、シィル殿。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-oh, Lord Rance, Lady Siil. Hmm hmm hmm.
? Is something wrong?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだか慌てているようですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You seem to be in a hurry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テラ様を捜しておりましてな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are searching for Lady Tera...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかで見かけませんでしたかな？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you seen her anywhere? Hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、テラ様なら先ほど屋上へ向かっていましたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lady Tera headed for the rooftop a little while ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお……ありがとうございます……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... thank you very much... hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、テラ様……お付きもつけず……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Lady Tera... without any attendants... hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are searching for Lady Tera...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこかで見かけませんでしたかな？　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have you seen her anywhere? Hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、テラ様なら先ほど屋上へ向かっていましたよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lady Tera headed for the rooftop a little while ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお……ありがとうございます……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh... thank you very much... hmm hmm hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、テラ様……お付きもつけず……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Lady Tera... without any attendants... hmm hmm hmm.
